info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:25PM CDT until May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN GRANT...SOUTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTHERN JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN AND ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Palmer to 9 miles west of De Witt to near Lamont, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Rison... White Hall... Altheimer... Grady... Almyra... St. Charles... Whitefield... Little Bayou Meto Park... Woodville... Cottondale... Lamont... Linwood... Madding... Kedron... Langford... Palmer... Richardson... De Witt... Warbritton... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 35 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
